Biden announces new sanctions vs Russia two years into Ukraine warU.S. President Joe Biden on Friday announced Washington would issue more than 500 new sanctions targeting Russia as the United States seeks to increase pressure on Moscow to mark the second anniversary of its war in Ukraine. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:43:28 GMT QW7KABXVCNK6VARTHXKZU6Z4EY https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-announces-new-sanctions-vs-Russia-two-years-into-ukraine-war-2024-02-23/Daphne Psaledakis世界
Danish PM Frederiksen meets Ukraine's Zelenskiy in LvivDanish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen met President Volodymyr Zelenskiy in the western Ukrainian city of Lviv on Friday, a day before the second anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:39:35 GMT OWQI72ACJ5KWRNKYCDCLSBUNY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/danish-pm-frederiksen-meets-ukraines-zelenskiy-lviv-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
'Good news': Poland to get up to 137 bln euros in funds, says EU chiefPoland will gain access to up to 137 billion euros ($148 billion) in European Union funds, the head of the EU executive said on Friday, after the new government in Warsaw began implementing reforms it says will restore judicial independence in the country. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:32:30 GMT KJ25CGSE7RJW5NNCUXXOTQ2NCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-unblock-up-137-bln-euros-funds-poland-says-von-der-leyen-2024-02-23/Anna Koper世界欧洲
Ukrainian rapeseed spilled from train at Polish borderPolish police are investigating an incident on Friday in which a load of rapeseed was spilled from train trucks carrying the cargo from Ukraine near the Dorohusk border crossing with Poland. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:00:43 GMT L3KJT2ANFNL2JP4Y3T7XDHPN64 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-rapeseed-spilled-train-polish-border-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Protesting Indian farmers burn effigies of Modi and other ministersIndian farmers demanding higher prices for their crops burned effigies of Prime Minister Narendra Modi and other ministers on Friday as they sought to expand their protest against his government months before elections. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 10:54:19 GMT LVLYTGFQNRNR3IQHV6ULDZKNFA https://www.reuters.com/world/india/protesting-indian-farmers-burn-effigies-modi-other-ministers-2024-02-23/Adnan Abidi, Sunil Kataria, Sakshi Dayal世界印度
Pakistani Islamist parties rally against top judge on blasphemy accusationsHundreds of supporters from Pakistani Islamist parties on Friday rallied to protest against what they say were blasphemous remarks by the country's chief justice. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 10:34:19 GMT FTMZO5L26RMN5LSQELZL275FQE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistani-islamist-parties-rally-against-top-judge-blasphemy-accusations-2024-02-23/Reuters世界亚太地区
Somalia will defend itself if Ethiopia seals 'illegal' port deal, president saysSomali President Hassan Sheikh Mohamud said his country would "defend itself" if Ethiopia goes ahead with a deal to set up a naval base in the breakaway region of Somaliland and possibly recognise the territory as an independent state. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 10:33:16 GMT OPGXEJ2ZIFLPZKN6NIVVHT7DAM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/somalia-will-defend-itself-if-ethiopia-seals-illegal-port-deal-president-says-2024-02-23/Giulia Paravicini世界非洲
UK-born woman who joined Islamic State loses appeal over citizenship removalA British-born woman who went to Syria as a schoolgirl to join Islamic State lost her latest appeal on Friday over the removal of her British citizenship. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 10:23:08 GMT HTGL7FSJYVIN7EM2OQNCKNKEUY https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/british-born-woman-who-joined-islamic-state-loses-appeal-over-citizenship-2024-02-23/Sam Tobin世界英国
France proposes starting EU Capital Markets Union with small group of countriesFrance proposed on Friday that European Union member states which back the creation of Capital Markets Union should initially go it alone to accelerate a project that has dragged on for a decade. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 10:17:52 GMT 55MZNRATKNMCHOFMUPYJ3ZUUVE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-proposes-starting-eu-capital-markets-union-with-small-group-countries-2024-02-23/Jan Strupczewski世界欧洲
Germany set to join legal cannabis clubGermany's parliament is expected to pass a law on Friday legalising the cultivation and consumption of a limited amount of cannabis, regularising the behaviour of the 4.5 million Germans estimated to use the drug. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 10:07:13 GMT NDIQAUNDWVNUNEWOQV7ZCO2X24 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germany-set-join-legal-cannabis-club-2024-02-23/Thomas Escritt世界欧洲
Sudan's warring sides commit abuses, including strikes on fleeing civilians, UN report saysBoth sides in Sudan's civil war have committed abuses that may amount to war crimes including indiscriminate attacks on civilian sites like hospitals, markets and even camps for the displaced, the U.N. human rights office said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 09:54:05 GMT IE2ZK6SWXFKDLP4QRROVSVFVMQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/sudans-warring-sides-commit-abuses-include-strikes-fleeing-civilians-un-report-2024-02-23/Reuters世界非洲
